sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_kmf.KMFRevokeCertificate</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Revoke certificate</description>
        <name>KMFRevokeCertificate</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var KMFRevokeCertificate = Class.create();
KMFRevokeCertificate.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	revokeCertificate: function() {
        var sysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_key_sysid');
        var revocation_reason = this.getParameter('sysparm_revocation_reason');
        var result = new sn_kmf_ns.KMFInstancePKI().revoke(sysId, revocation_reason);
        var parsedResult = JSON.parse(result);
        var output = this.newItem("output");
        output.setAttribute("success", parsedResult.success);
        output.setAttribute("message", parsedResult.message);
    },
	canRevokeCertificateCondition: function() {
        return gs.hasRole("sn_kmf.cryptographic_manager") || gs.hasRole("maint");
    },
    type: 'KMFRevokeCertificate'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-08-25 00:33:47</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4eb5fbab530230101494ddeeff7b12c9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>KMFRevokeCertificate</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework" source="sn_kmf">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4eb5fbab530230101494ddeeff7b12c9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-09-15 05:26:16</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
